message:
Sometimes you may want to pass a JavaScript object from the client to the server (e.g. http://kynetxappaday.wordpress.com/2010/12/28/day-23-decode-function-convert-json-to-objects/). And you find the IE does not support JSON.stringify(). Grab the json2.js file from here:

https://github.com/douglascrockford/JSON-js

then add a use resource line to the meta block of your ruleset:

use javascript resource "http://www.example.com/json2.js"
